<h3 id="X35624">X(35624) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER  OF THESE TRIANGLES: INVERSE-IN-CONWAY AND TANGENTIAL-MIDARC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a+2*b^2*c+2*b*c^2)*sin(A/2)-2*(a+c)*b^2*sin(B/2)-2*(a+b)*c^2*sin(C/2)+(b+c)*a^2+(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a+(b+c)*b*c)  :  :
<p>X(35624) lies on these lines:
{1,164}, {177,314}, {188,35628}, {1764,8075}, {2089,10473}, {3741,21622}, {5208,11888}, {8079,10477}, {8081,10476}, {8084,11895}, {8085,10478}, {8087,10479}, {8089,35621}, {8091,10441}, {8095,35635}, {8097,35636}, {8099,35631}, {8101,35645}, {8103,35649}, {8133,35618}, {8135,35619}, {8241,10480}, {8247,35622}, {8249,35623}, {8387,35617}, {8733,35612}, {9793,10453}, {9853,35629}, {10439,11192}, {10444,12726}, {10503,21334}, {10967,12554}, {11044,35620}, {11690,35614}, {11858,35613}, {12544,12714}, {12568,35632}, {12580,35633}, {12643,35634}, {12771,35638}, {12870,35639}, {12916,35630}, {13072,35643}, {13124,35646}, {16146,35637}, {17629,35626}, {31578,35648}, {31579,35647}, {34025,34045}</p>
<p>
X(35624) = {X(1), X(35644)}-harmonic conjugate of X(35625)<br>
